item.description:
Did you order a few more seeds than you can actually plant? Some of your perennial plants need dividing and gifting? Got a kombucha mother or some kefir grains to pass along?

For this month's meetup we'll celebrate the power of gifting! And you may end up doing some receiving as well! Bring a dish to share, your own potluck kit (dish/bowl, utensils, cup, napkin) and any seeds, plants or culture/mother/scoby type things you may have to share. Don't forget some envelopes, markers, yogurt tubs, buckets, etc. to bring home your loot!
item.how_to_find_us: parking is in front of zero station and the aikido shop and on the road (just not in the lot directly in front of the bakery:)

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: April Meetup & Potluck: Swap 'Til You Drop
